start.description: Starts the specified robot vacuum cleaner.

entity_id.description: Entity ID of the robot vacuum cleaner to start.

stop.description: Stops the specified robot vacuum cleaner.

entity_id.description: Entity ID of the robot vacuum cleaner to stop.

pause.description: Pauses the specified robot vacuum cleaner.

entity_id.description: Entity ID of the robot vacuum cleaner to pause.

return_to_base.description: Tells the specified robot vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.

entity_id.description: Entity ID of the robot vacuum cleaner to return to its dock.

cleaning.description: Starts a cleaning cycle for the specified robot vacuum cleaner.

entity_id.description: Entity ID of the robot vacuum cleaner to start cleaning.
